channel.title: Virtual Machine Help Please!
channel.description:
I need help with Virtual Machine.....Well i download VM And installed my os which is xp home addition.Then i download the VM tools and had no problem and then i went to install my wirless card which let's me connect to the internet..But i installed it and i restarted VM and i clicked on the icon for the card and it said it is'nt inserted....What do i do? Im using a router and modem so i have to use wirless cause im on a lap top...Yeah so please post on here or msg me on aim or msn..
MSN= gamemaster_36@hotmail.com
AIM= skatetopia2006@aol.com
Thank's ahead of time if you help !!! :)

item.title: Virtual Machine Help Please!
item.dc:creator: @mrrules mrrules
item.description:
@mrrules wrote:

You emailed me??.. im confusyed

EDIT: You mean during the xp install?
And would 95 be better?..???..??

Read full topic

item.title: Virtual Machine Help Please!
item.dc:creator: @bootnecklad bootnecklad
item.description:
@bootnecklad wrote:

i’m gonna say this to you and e-mail you,
if you installed windows xp on VM then when you choose how to set the internet up choose bridged, it will do it all for you

Read full topic

item.title: Virtual Machine Help Please!
item.dc:creator: @The_Un-Named The Un-Named
item.description:
@The_Un-Named wrote:

If you have xp installed, install your driver using cd, go to CD and use your drive, open your virtual pc’s computer, go to the drive and install the driver, save and close, go to the screen where you start it, go to settings and for internet choose your card.

If your still installing windows = install with no internet.

Read full topic
